suggest.meta_keywords: CORS, edge computing, HTTP headers, Cross-Origin Resource Sharing, Azion Console, Real-Time Manager, Rules Engine, HTTP requests, Access-Control-Allow-Origin, Configuration
suggest.meta_description: Explore how to enable CORS in Edge Computing using Azion's Console and Real-Time Manager. Learn to configure HTTP headers for secure, cross-origin resource sharing.

current.meta_description: Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS) is a mechanism for using HTTP headers to give access permission to a User Agent for specific resources that are on a different origin server to the document in use.
current.meta_keywords: cors, edge computing, Cross-Origin Resource Sharing
